Name: Days for shipping (real)
DESCRIPTION: Actual shipping days of the purchased product

Name: Days for shipment (scheduled)
DESCRIPTION: Days of scheduled delivery of the purchased product

Name: Sales per customer
DESCRIPTION: Total sales per customer made per customer

Name: Customer City
DESCRIPTION: City where the customer made the purchase

Name: Customer Country
DESCRIPTION: Country where the customer made the purchase

Name: Customer State
DESCRIPTION: State to which the store where the purchase is registered belongs

Name: Customer Street
DESCRIPTION: Street to which the store where the purchase is registered belongs

Name: Latitude
DESCRIPTION: Latitude corresponding to location of store

Name: Longitude
DESCRIPTION: Longitude corresponding to location of store

Name: Market
DESCRIPTION: Market to where the order is delivered

Name: order date (DateOrders)
DESCRIPTION: Date on which the order is made

Name: Order Item Cardprod Id
DESCRIPTION: Product code generated through the RFID reader

Name: Order Region
DESCRIPTION: Region of the world where the order is delivered

Name: Order State
DESCRIPTION: State of the region where the order is delivered

Name: Product Image
DESCRIPTION: Link of visit and purchase of the product

Name: Shipping date (DateOrders)
DESCRIPTION: Exact date and time of shipment
